Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Parittattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
91.
2152Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta…pe…  namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2153Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
